ðŸ“– Summary: HTTP Shortcuts is an Android application that allows users to create home screen shortcuts to trigger custom HTTP requests. It supports various HTTP methods, authentication schemes, and response handling options, enabling users to automate tasks and interact with web services directly from their mobile devices.
